channel.title: Negative Wild... :(

item.title: Negative Wild... :(
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

The wilderness is north; The level increases as you go north, so if you are creating an area that isn’t in the wilderness, it’s obviously going to be in the negative.

Make it write new text when you enter the area.

item.title: Negative Wild... :(
item.dc:creator: @Bunny_Ears1 Bunny Ears
item.description:
@Bunny_Ears1 wrote:

When i made Funpk and i added in to wild I went there and it gave me nagative wilderness. Can Anyone help me make it not negative?

public boolean inWild() { if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 || absX > 2937 && absX < 3067 && absY > 3306 && absY < 3391 || absX > 3194 && absX < 3072 && absY > 3190 && absY < 3403 || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10366 || inFunPk()) { return true; } return false; } public boolean inFunPk() { return absX > 2976 && absX < 2997 && absY > 9625 && absY < 9648; }

Read full topic
